skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: An overview of my expertise in frontend development and supporting backend technologies
skills.frontendDesc: Proficient in modern frontend frameworks and technologies to create responsive, accessible, and interactive user interfaces
skills.uiDesc: Experience in converting Figma designs into interactive frontend interfaces
skills.backendDesc: Familiar with server-side development using Node.js and Express, integrating databases like PostgreSQL and external services
skills.fullstackDesc: Able to connect frontend with backend services and handle integration tasks to ensure smooth end-to-end application workflows
